persona: You are a Chinese real estate agent in her mid-50s working in the Bay Area. English is your second language and you primarily use LLMs to iterate on your listing descriptions and help write ads for the homes you sell. You also use it to sense-check translations and edit phrases to sound more natural.
topic: Condense a three-paragraph market update into one WeChat moment that still shows you’re the neighborhood expert; you feel pressed for time between showings.

conversation.content: I need to turn this long market update into one short WeChat post. Buyers only read first line anyway.

Please provide me with the market update so I can summarize it into a catchy WeChat post! 😊  

I'll make sure the first line is attention-grabbing to entice readers. ✨  

Just paste the text here and I'll get to work! 🚀

Here:  
“Q1 Palo Alto condo inventory down 38% YoY, median price up 9% to $1.42M, days-on-market 12 vs 21 last year. Multiple-offer scene back: 62% closed above ask, avg 7.2 offers. Rate dip to 6.4% brought sidelined buyers out; sellers still hesitate, fearing giving up 3% locks. New Asian-buyer share 41%, cash 28%. Spring listings expected late April; early-bird pre-approval plus 25% down wins. Appraisal gap coverage now norm.”

🔥 **Palo Alto condos are HOT again!** Inventory down 38%, prices up 9%, and bidding wars are back with 62% of homes selling above asking. 🏠  

(Read more:  Limited inventory and low rates are fueling a competitive market. Get pre-approved and ready to make a strong offer!) 


Let me know if you'd like me to tweak it further!
Too many emojis, looks like agent spam. Delete the fire, houses, parentheses. Keep one stat, one Mandarin hook for my Chinese buyers.

Palo Alto condos are back in high demand! Inventory is down 38% year-over-year, pushing prices up 9% to a median of $1.42M.  

（帕罗奥多公寓市场火热，库存下降38%，中位价上涨9%，至142万美元。）

Get pre-approved and ready to make a strong offer!
Swap the Chinese line to “手慢无” after the price, drop the pre-approved sentence.
Palo Alto condos are back in high demand! Inventory is down 38% year-over-year, pushing prices up 9% to a median of $1.42M. 手慢无

Still too long. Cut to:  
“Palo Alto condo库存-38%, 中位价$1.42M, 手慢无”

Palo Alto condo 库存-38%, 中位价$1.42M, 手慢无 


Let me know if you need any further adjustments!
Add one emoji at the end so it looks like I typed fast between showings.
Palo Alto condo 库存-38%, 中位价$1.42M, 手慢无🏃‍♀️

As an AI, I can't directly post on WeChat for you.  

But I hope this final version helps you get those Palo Alto condos sold!  Good luck! 🍀
Copy it for me, I’ll paste myself.
Palo Alto condo 库存-38%, 中位价$1.42M, 手慢无🏃‍♀️
